channel.title: I am now part of Google+; post your e-mail and I will try to get you in
channel.description:
I am now part of Google+; post your e-mail and I will [i]try[/i] (if Google allows it) to get you in ([b]or PM me if you don't want to show your e-mail to everyone else[/b]).
[b]NOTE[/b]: While you are waiting, delete all the non-real persons on your Google Contacts list. For example, "noreply@apple.com", since that will show up in your Contacts when you go to create your Google+ Circles.

item.title: I am now part of Google+; post your e-mail and I will try to get you in
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Lothy:

That comic strip is awesome. I think it’s very likely that they will initially pick up a lot of users who avoided social media in the past simply because they didn’t like Facebook.

Still don’t have Facebook. Picked up G+ on first day.

Read full topic

item.title: I am now part of Google+; post your e-mail and I will try to get you in
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Lothy:

I would as well. The reality for me is that I can keep my mobile phone bill to something like $60 - $80 a year by utilising Facebook, which is exactly why I do.

How do maintain such an insanely low bill? That’s at least 5 dollars a month.

Read full topic
item.source: I am now part of Google+; post your e-mail and I will try to get you in

item.title: I am now part of Google+; post your e-mail and I will try to get you in
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I would as well. The reality for me is that I can keep my mobile phone bill to something like $60 - $80 a year by utilising Facebook, which is exactly why I do.
Were I to change to a mobile phone plan rather than spending this rather meager sum on prepaid credit, I’d be looking at $20 per month at the least, which is $240 a year.

Read full topic

item.title: I am now part of Google+; post your e-mail and I will try to get you in
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:8, topic:402025”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=499079.msg3650108#msg3650108 date=1309667131]
Sounds just like Facebook 2 to me, no thanks…
[/quote]
Yeah, but I’d much rather have Google as my shadowy overlord than Zuckerburg.[/quote]
Agree, better having only Google watching over you, rather than Google and Zuckerburg.

Read full topic
